content: 2023 flower scrunchies flower scrunchies by winter dieckman notes these are super quick to make and a great way to use up some scrap yarn i used some left over yarn from another project using i love this cotton yarn in colors coral buttercup aspyn aqua and periwinkle materials yarn - approx 10-12 yards of worsted weight yarn hook - u s i/5 5 mm needle for weaving in ends pattern instructions abbreviations flower scrunchie **all sts should be worked around the hair band** slip_stitch - slip_stitch see photos on page 2 for the next 4 steps single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet 1 - with your yarn on your hook hold the hair band in double_crochet - double_crochet front of the working yarn treble_crochet - treble_crochet 2 - insert your hook into the hair band dtr - double treble_crochet 3 - yarn over pull through the hair band r - row or round 4 - yarn over pull through both loops on your hook st - stitch this completes your 1st single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet dtr dtr treble_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet 6 times or until the hair band is completely covered slip_stitch in the 1st st to join finish off weave in the ends page 1 copyright winter wool designs 2023 1 - with your yarn on your 2 - insert your hook into the 3 - yarn over hook hold the hair band in hair band front of the working yarn 3 - pull through the hair band 4 - yarn over 4 - pull through both loops on your hook where to find me and coordinating patterns winterwooldesigns@gmail com https //www winterwooldesigns com/ https //linktr ee/winterwooldesigns page 2 copyright winter wool designs 2023
